text: From Paul, a prisoner of Christ Jesus, and Timothy our brother, to Philemon, our dear friend and colaborer,

to <st data-num="682" class="">Apphia</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="79" class="">sister</st>,<n id="2" /> to <st data-num="751" class="">Archippus</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="4961">fellow soldier</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to the <st data-num="1577" class="">church</st> that <st data-num="2596">meets in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st>.
Grace and peace to you from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ!
I always thank my God as I remember you in my prayers,

because I <st data-num="191" class="">hear</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="4314">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> your <st data-num="26" class="">love</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st>.<n id="3" />

I pray<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3704">that</st> the <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2842" class="">share</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> may <st data-num="1756 1096">deepen</st> your <st data-num="1922" class="">understanding</st> of <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="18" class="">blessing</st><n id="2" /> that belongs to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.<n id="4" />
I have had great joy and encouragement because of your love, for the hearts of the saints have been refreshed through you, brother.
So, although I have quite a lot of confidence in Christ and could command you to do what is proper,

I would <st data-num="3123" class="">rather</st> <st data-num="3870" class="">appeal</st><n id="1" /> to you <st data-num="1223" class="">on the basis of</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st>—I, <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st>, an <st data-num="4246">old man</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="3570" class="">now</st> a <st data-num="1198" class="">prisoner</st> for the sake of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st><n id="3" />—

I am <st data-num="3870" class="">appealing</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">concerning</st> <st data-num="1699">my</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">child</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">whose</st> spiritual <st data-num="1080">father</st> I have <st data-num="1080">become</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">during</st> my <st data-num="1199" class="">imprisonment</st>,<n id="3" /> that is, <st data-num="3682" class="">Onesimus</st>,

who was <st data-num="4218" class="">formerly</st> <st data-num="890" class="">useless</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> is <st data-num="3570" class="">now</st> <st data-num="2173" class="">useful</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

I have <st data-num="375" class="">sent</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> (<st data-num="3778">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1699" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4698">very heart</st>)<n id="2" /> <st data-num="375" class="">back</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.

<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1014" class="">wanted</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2722" class="">keep</st> <st data-num="3739">him</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1683">me</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> he could <st data-num="1247" class="">serve</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st><st data-num="5228"> place</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">during</st><n id="2" /> my <st data-num="1199" class="">imprisonment</st> for the sake of the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">However</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5565" class="">without</st> <st data-num="4674">your</st> <st data-num="1106" class="">consent</st> I did <st data-num="3762">not</st> <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3762">anything</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="18">good deed</st> would <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="2596">out of</st> <st data-num="318" class="">compulsion</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2596">from</st> your own <st data-num="1595" class="">willingness</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5029" class="">perhaps</st> it was <st data-num="1223">for</st> <st data-num="3778">this reason</st> that he was <st data-num="5563" class="">separated</st> from you <st data-num="4314" class="">for</st> a <st data-num="5610">little while</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> you would <st data-num="568" class="">have</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="568" class="">back</st> <st data-num="166" class="">eternally</st>,<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3765">no longer</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="5228">more than</st> a <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st>, as a <st data-num="27" class="">dear</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st>. He is <st data-num="3122" class="">especially</st> so to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="1161">and</st> <st data-num="4214" class="">even</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st> so to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> now, <st data-num="2532" class="">both</st> <st data-num="4561">humanly speaking</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>.

<st data-num="3767" class="">Therefore</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> you <st data-num="2192" class="">regard</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> as a <st data-num="2844" class="">partner</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4355" class="">accept</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> you would <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> he has <st data-num="91" class="">defrauded</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> of <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">owes</st> you anything, <st data-num="1677" class="">charge</st> <st data-num="3778">what he owes</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st>, <st data-num="3972" class="">Paul</st>, have <st data-num="1125" class="">written</st><n id="1" /> this letter<n id="2" /> with <st data-num="1699">my</st> <st data-num="1699" class="">own</st> <st data-num="5495">hand</st>:<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">I</st> will <st data-num="661" class="">repay</st> it. I <st data-num="3361" class="">could</st> also <st data-num="3004" class="">mention</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="4359" class="">owe</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="4572">your very self</st>.

<st data-num="3483" class="">Yes</st>, <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st>, let <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> have some <st data-num="3685" class="">benefit</st> from <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>. <st data-num="373" class="">Refresh</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4698" class="">heart</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.<n id="1" />

Since I was <st data-num="3982" class="">confident</st> that <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> would <st data-num="5218" class="">obey</st>, I <st data-num="1125" class="">wrote</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> because I <st data-num="1492" class="">knew</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you would <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="5228">more than</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> I am <st data-num="3004" class="">asking</st> you to do.
At the same time also, prepare a place for me to stay, for I hope that through your prayers I will be given back to you.
Epaphras, my fellow prisoner in Christ Jesus, greets you.

<st data-num="3138" class="">Mark</st>, <st data-num="708" class="">Aristarchus</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1214" class="">Demas</st>,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="3065" class="">Luke</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4904" class="">colaborers</st>, greet you too.
May the grace of the Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit.
